Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi everyone! Since the previous week, we have been solving issues related with investments in the project and negotiating with the funds that helped us to close the software cap, which we had announced earlier. The key result of our work over the month was the expansion of the concept of  of the HMT token and the transformation of the marketplace into a full ecosystem. In addition, at this stage, the project documentation is more consistent with the standards of work in the global market. We are beginning to talk about it since today and also, you can get acquainted with the new presentation by reference   https://www.hmstr.io/files/Presentation_en.pdf  As for bounty and Airdrop campaigns. Bounty campaign is finished. Tomorrow evening will be credited stacks for signature campaigh. And since now on the every day basis we will pay off the charges for each part  of the Bounty program. Airdrop will take a little longer, but will be completed by May 19th - the ending day of of the ICO.  Everyone who have bought tokens can already see the transfer in their personal account. You will be able to withdraw them to your personal wallets within 5 days after the end of the ICO.  Also, next week we will release a video with a detailed report of the changes in the project and its further development plan from the CEO - Denis Bulavin

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Dear members, please welcome our new advisor:  Victor Chow - FinTech Business Mentor, serial entrepreneur and senior corporate leader with over 28 years experience working in venture capital, start-ups, telecommunications, ICT, cryptofunds, financial & blockchain technologies, and most recently turned business investor. Victor has held CXO positions across general management, strategic planning, business development, sales, marketing and global operations management in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. He was previously the Founding CEO of Singapore-based Fintech Accelerator INSPIRASIA and was Head of Asia for Life.SREDA VC Fintech-focused fund. He was most renowned in the IT industry for his contributions as the Global Chief Operating Officer COO for Cloud Computing and NextGen Data Centers of Huawei Technologies, a leading global information and communications technology company based in ShenZhen China.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Ladies and Gentlemen, players welcome our new Advisor!  Justin Litchfield, Ph.D., CTO at BTC Labs is an experienced and accomplished software architect and engineer, technical programmer and entrepreneur, with over 10 years’ experience building software, content, internet and FinTech-based businesses.  Recently, he has been an integral part of the Po.et and MAD Network token sales, and built the CoinCart token payment processing platform.  Prior to that, Justin was CEO of Obsidian Software, where he built a fully operational mobile-app centered bank (bitPESO).  In addition to this, he has been a consultant and advisor to several FinTech and blockchain businesses, including Crypto-Asset mining and a traditional markets quant fund.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Dear members, we are happy to announce, that public token sale was finished successfully. Thanks to the pool investment the final sum of token sale totaled $4,6 mln. Within one week we’ll send all the bounty tokens and Airdrop. Moreover, next week we plan to make the video conference with our CEO Denis Bulavin. Team of Hamster Marketplace thank you for your support. After the following week we’ll start boost our activity related to the listing on the exchanges, but we understand, that this procedure can take from 1 to 6 month, depending on the exchange.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Where Hamster Marketplace Will Find DIY and Indie Electronics Manufacturers https://bitcoingarden.org/where-hamster-marketplace-will-find-diy-and-indie-electronics-manufacturers/  The central question of modern retail is where to find buyers. Nobody thinks about the importance of manufacturers: why take up mental space with what will come on its own? That is how the majority of major online retailers operate, as do practically all existing offline networks. They fight only over the major players: getting the chance to be directly supplied by Apple or Samsung at the initial wholesale price is the ultimate dream of any player in the retail market. But no one considers the interests of small manufacturers (vendors). The main reason for this is that you can’t “get much out of” them. A small manufacturer is only interesting to a similarly small or local retailer, one who doesn’t have enough of an assortment or has a unique target demographic.  And yet, small manufacturers—yesterday’s startups—contain huge potential for both the market and consumers. Hamster Marketplace is oriented specifically toward small manufacturers of unique products, but for the platform to fill up with vendors that its target audience expects, those manufacturers still need to be found: many of them hide in their cocoon of a promo website that doubles as a storefront for a single product, or they are drowning in the sea of Chinese-made copycats and look-alike offerings on Amazon and AliExpress....

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Where to invest when the market of cryptocurrency “sunk”? https://bitcoingarden.org/invest-market-cryptocurrency-sunk/  February 19 was the launch of the ICO for the Hamster Marketplace, the first decentralized trading platform offering gadgets and niche electronics. Hamster Marketplace gives novice and local producers a way to sell niche electronics to a hungry market without a single middleman.  Hamster Marketplace will open the niche electronics market to thousands of vendors around the world who cannot afford to sell through current platforms. It will allow millions of buyers to find one-of-a-kind products and buy them without a middleman’s markup. The marketplace will be run by the producers themselves.  Given the difficult situation on the cryptocurrency market, a great alternative to cryptocurrencies is the purchase of tokens for projects that have already launched their ICOs or that are approaching their main round of token sales. One such project is Hamster Marketplace, a project to create a decentralized trading platform for indie manufacturers of gadgets and electronics. Unlike the projects of a year ago, Hamster Marketplace is supported not just by promises of “income from the token exchange rate” and hazy plans for the future, but by its reserve of experienced developers and managers, and by its own niche that no one has fully occupied. This is a fully-fledged, mature project that was created not under the “nursery” conditions of the novelty of tokens as a tool, but under fierce competition....

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings! First, even the analogues can be successful in the industry of electronics… You should agree that every country have several networks which trade almost the same devices and they get along successfully and each of them has clients. Secondly, this projects implements the advantages of blockchain and, consequently, decentralization. Moreover, the project is focused on niche demand and unique gadgets, it will let it benefit, anyway.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Why is the description of the project stated that the platform will have the lowest prices if the producers can also sell their goods in other marketplaces? After all, then on other websites, vendor products can be at lower prices. It turns out that this is a very loud statement!

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, indeed, vendors will be able to place their goods on other sites, but the platform will operate a semi-automatic mechanism that guarantees the lowest prices for Hamster.

Author: dsjkhkhf3
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I do not understand where the connection is? What kind of mechanism is that which gives guarantees?

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This mechanism will parse all the websites on which the products of manufacturers working on Hamster are represented, and will automatically equalize prices if it finds any deviations.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And, if the deviation of the price is more than 10%, then manual moderation is activated. The price will change after discussion with the vendor to avoid any misunderstandings and malicious intent.

Author: dsjkhkhf3
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

So you’ll have to return at least to the previous rate within a year rather than to approach the $50 level. IMHO.

The only differences are some options and that's all. Well, the cost of use will probably be slightly less, but Amazon has a great number of products’ categories.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, there’re no dividends provided for HMT token holders. The point is that tokens are a debt obligation of the company to investors; it means that buyers of coins loan out their money to Hamster.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But if I loan out to somebody, does it mean that I will get my money back sooner or later?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, absolutely true! This is that very purpose for which a campaign dedicated to redeem of all the tokens sold is created, it will start immediately after the launch of the platform and will last until the marketplace will be sold to the vendors.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Great, I got it, thank you for your answer! Now I’m wondering at what price the company will redeem the tokens.

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The uniqueness of the niche of this project consist in the fact that it will be somewhere between Kickstarter and Amazon. It means that companies that are ready to sell goods, but not ready to face high competition on large sites yet will come here. Consequently, small companies will have an opportunity to begin to get receive a stable profit. There’re no similar projects yet, so the project creates a new, unique niche.

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, it will still finally become just a trading platform: a lot of similar goods and the growing appetites of the company's founders, as result, the commissions and subscription fees will become more expensive.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No similar goods! Developers will allow only those organizations that will be able to offer innovative and unique gadgets to enter the platform. All goods will undergo a thorough check, which excludes the appearance of the same type of goods on the site. As for the “constantly growing appetite of the founders”, it’s also impossible, ’cause the marketplace will be sold to vendors in 2020.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Uhhh, no. This info is too unreliable. The company will provide opportunity to enter the markets that are currently unavailable for small producers by creating a platform where companies of the same size will compete. In addition, the audience of the project will be buyers who are interested only in unknown, innovative gadgets.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Does it make any sense for customers to switch to Hamster, if there’re large sites like Amazon or eBay?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course it does make sense! Unique gadgets are covered by universal goods, high mark-ups of intermediaries and great competition on the trading floors that you’ve mentioned. Hamster offers buyers products with a minimum platform’s mark-up, which is charged to maintain the project.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It will be great if that’s true. And how will the founders of the company achieve minimum markups?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hamster’s experts exclude the possibility of presence of intermediaries on the platform. Their activities on the platform will be implemented only by manufacturers ready to sell their goods directly. Moreover, each vendor will have his own marketplace; they’ll be able to manage it basing on their own tastes.

Author: sinfazat22ron
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Friends, is it possible to buy tokens for $2/unit?

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The modern e-commerce market has many problems. It seems that Hamster solves many of them. However, I was disappointed when I found out that the problem of freezing of producers' funds in receivables wasn’t solved. I hope that in the course of the company's development the way out will be found.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And what could be a solution? The manufacturer should simply immediately receive funds for the sale of goods. By the way, that's exactly how Hamster solved the problem of the freezing of funds in accounts receivable, so you were disappointed in vain)))

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I know that some companies face the problem of concluding contracts with large trading platforms ‘cause of a lack of legal skills. What will be the registration on this platform?

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Registration will be as simple as possible. The most important stage of registration is product verification. Each manufacturer will have to send his goods to the Hamster office, where they’ll be checked by competent staff. Of course, it will take some time.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I believe that the main problem of small companies is the allocation of funds to marketing. Such organizations can’t afford large advertising budgets. However, Hamster will offer marketing tools which will require not that small costs. I wasn’t pleased with this fact.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There will really be marketing tools, but who told you that they will be expensive? On the contrary, their cost will be minimal. That’s why each manufacturer can afford promotion within the platform, you shouldn’t worry about this.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Will vendors have an opportunity to advertise their goods outside Hamster? Contextual advertising, for example?

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi everybody. Can I pay for the purchase of coins with Ethereum?

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course you can! You can buy just more than 460 coins For 1 Eth at the moment!

Body: What about cooperating with Kickstarter? They have many interesting projects on their platform; you could offer them to open their stores on your platform.

Body: Sounds interesting project! Good luck. I will be paying close attention

Body: Good day, forum users! Does anyone know who will access participation in the private ICO-2020?

Author: robinzzon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’m wondering if you’re planning to somehow lure prospective producers which have not yet fully revealed themselves on big trading platforms away from those platforms.

Author: Veecker
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I became very interested in the prospect of working on Hamster. Tell me, will you help new vendors to set the trading platform for the first time? It would be amazing!

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Will public sale of tokens start on January 1?

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good  afternoon. Are you sure that Hamster platform token emission will be one-time? When the platform will be managed by vendors, they can initiate a second process.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, they won’t. First, the developers won’t provide them with access. Secondly, all tokens will be burnt during the buy-back.

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don’t think that all of them will be burnt. Nevertheless, some holders will simply forget about the tokens, so a 100% of the result can’t be achieved with the help of redeem of tokens

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hey. I’ve read in the WP that tokens will be sold at a 20%discount on the pre-sale and today I received a message that the 20% discount is still valid only for one more day. What's wrong?

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Anyway, these tokens will lose their force as debt obligations, and their value will be maintained only by demand. So using them for re-issue isn’t a good idea.

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: 20% discount is valid only for the first 10 days of the sale. Since December 21, it will be 15%, and since December 26 - 10%. However, the terms are still better than on a public sale.

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, but there will be services on the platform, which will be paid only with internal tokens, am I right?

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But as far as I remember, such a gradation wasn’t described in the WP, at least in the version I’ve read.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This is extremely unlikely. I believe that after the platform is given to vendors, all the services will be paid with fiat means or any crypto-currency, but definitely not with tokens.

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The developers announced this before the sale, so if you followed at least one of the social networks of the project, you would know about it.

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It will take place in 2020, when the company will be sold to vendors. The company's founders are planning to spend all the income from the sale on the buy-back of coins, thereby repaying debts to their sponsors.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It sounds more interesting. And at what price the coins be redeemed?

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It’s difficult to make any forecasts at this stage, but the founders of the company are sure that they will buy back one token at a price at least of $50 per one token in 2020. It means that the participants of the ICO will be able to increase their capital at least by 25 times!!

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It’s interesting; you say that $50 is a minimum, which means that the price may be higher. Under what circumstances will the rate of coins be higher than $50 in 2020?

Author: _ko33TPas
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Comrades, is it possible to pay for coins with fiat money?

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, there won’t be such an opportunity. You can pay for the purchase of tokens only with crypto-currencies. You can find a list of crypto-currencies accepted by the company on the official website.

Author: Shaurman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If the company reaches a large sales volume and a huge audience on Hamster, will it be able to go to a large trading platform and still continue to work on Hamster?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Definitely, yes!

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Thank you very much for the information, we will do!

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The niche is really new and unique one, I've never encountered any such projects yet. But in this regard, I doubt that Hamster marketers will be able to keep within the budget and attract a planned number of vendors and buyers to the site. I’ll still refrain from investing; maybe later I will purchase coins on a crypto-exchange.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It’s your right, but you should be aware that the coins will cost much more than $2 (the current value on the ICO) on the exchange. As for attracting vendors and buyers, marketers have already planned a strategy and calculated all the costs, so there won’t be any problems with the promotion of the site.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And what is the main idea of Hamster promotion?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Marketers will focus promotion of the platform on the sites where there’re lots of small manufacturers of unique gadgets and people who are interested in such products. I mean projects like Kickstarter, Indiegogo, etc. Such an approach will ensure success in promotion of the site in case of a competent implementation (which Hamster will certainly have).

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, it sounds convincing now, I like it! And how many funds is it planned to spend on promoting the project?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It will depend on the amount of funds collected during the ICO. All in all, marketers plan to spend up to $2000 on attracting one vendor and up to $7 on attracting one buyer. Such costs allow you to get 1000 vendors and 1.4 million buyers in case of collection of $12 million USD during the sale.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If it’s true, I will definitely invest in Hamster. Moreover, in case of such a demand for coins within the platform and the gradual burning of tokens, their rate will grow inexorably. By the way, do you plan to conduct the marketing company on a permanent basis or only at the first time after the platform is launched?

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: polonium84

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: HMT's tokens are not securities of the company, so what dividends can be paid? These are debt obligations, it means that Hamster's founders borrow money from customers for the development of a platform, and then it will be returned with profit for each creditor.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Really? And how and when does the company plan to repay its sponsors?

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This profit is necessary to maintain workability of the platform and buy-back of coins. The founders of the company don’t take any money for themselves, that’s why the project is considered to be non-commercial.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi everybody. I can’t really understand what niche does Hamster want to get in the market if the founders of the project doesn’t refer themselves neither to Amazon nor Kickstarter, for example. Can anybody explain me this?

Author: alcoholbtc
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You’re a bit mistaken ‘cause Hamster plans to get a new niche between Amazon and Kickstarter. It will take some options of both of them. Of course, the base of the project will be unique, and the use of blockchain will make a project be a breakthrough in this area.

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Why does the project plan to get a niche between these projects?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If I want to switch to another platform in the future, will I have such an opportunity?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

After all, the promotion of products won’t depend on producers; it will depend only on Hamster’s advertising activity. The lack of marketing tools makes it impossible for the manufacturer to promote his brand.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

It doesn’t make any sense to somehow manipulate the prices, there will be an automatic algorithm in Hamster which will parse the Internet and make the prices equal in case of finding a cheaper option.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: 1. You will have available for payment Bitcoin, Ethereum and Emercoin. In the next few days, other popular coins will be added. 2. By clicking on the "Wallet address" button you will receive the wallet number of the selected crypto currency, tied to your email. 3. Transfer the desired amount to this purse and click the "Update Status" button, which will start checking the payment. Usually it takes from 5 to 30 minutes, but delays are possible in case of blockchain overloading. 4. Validation awaits 1 confirmation from Bitcoin and Emercoin blockers or 12 confirmations from Ethereum. 5. After the check, you will see the receipt of purchased tokens from the calculation of 1 HMT for $ 1.6 at the rate of payment crypto currency at the time of confirmation. 6. You can check the status of payment yourself by clicking on the link next to the purse address. 7. In order to be able to send and receive HMT tokens to other users, after completing the presale it will be necessary to pass the identification procedure (KYC). This is a mandatory requirement of exchanges, without which the addition of a token to the listing and further trading will not be possible.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You told about the buy-back program, but I can’t find any information on it. Can you tell us how it will be conducted?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No problem. The buy-back program will be launched immediately after the launch of the platform. There will be a standard redeem of coins from holders conducted until 2020, and the final redemption of tokens is expected in 2020. Then the company will sell the marketplace to the vendors, and the income from the sale will be spent on purchasing of all the coins remaining in circulation. After that, the HMT tokens will be excluded from circulation.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As for me, if I were a manufacturer, I would choose the AliExpress trading platform to place my goods, ‘cause the difference between the platforms is small, and AliExpress’s commission is less: 8% vs Hamster’s 20%. And the audience on the Chinese platform is much larger.

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In fact, there is an annual fee from $3,100 to $ 4,600 charged from sellers on AliExpress in addition to the 8% commission. So Hamster’s commission doesn’t exceed AliExpress’s one. And all in all, the commission isn’t the point. Hamster has a lot of other advantages over this platform for small manufacturers.

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I somehow can’t find any advantages. Small companies can earn much more money on a large marketplace with a world known name than on a small and unknown one.

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: A small unknown platform for little known producers. In my opinion, it’s perfect!)) Of course, I’m just kidding... The point is that Hamster will accept small manufacturers of unique gadgets and attract buyers interested in such products. Unique gadgets will “drown” in competition with large companies that offer universal, banal products on AliExpress. Moreover, there’s a large share of low-quality “handicraft” products on AliExpress, that’s one more reason why it’s difficult for small companies to develop there.

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, you know, the similar “handicraft” goods can be sold on Hamster, too, so the difference isn’t that big.

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The difference is very big, because platform developers have excluded the possibility of appearing of such products on their marketplace. This will be achieved with the help of manual verification of all the products of each vendor.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: CryptoKitties crosses paths with the CryptoHamsters: How The Ethereum-Based dApp is affecting ICOs     Explosive growth of the CryptoKitties project with subsequent overload of Ethereum networks due to clogging of transactions, is the reason why a lot of ICOs have postponed their token-sales. One of the first is Sophia TX, a startup which has postponed their ICO, which was supposed to start on 5thDecember, by two days. CryptoKitties have also affected CryptoHamsters’ plans for the Hamster Marketplace project. The team of HM has decided to postpone their pre-sale from 7 to 11 of December.   The team has postponed its tokens presale due to malfunction of the Ethereum Blockchain. It was affected by numerous smart-contracts of CryptoKitties game as described in the official announcement of HM:   On Friday was supposed to mark the beginning of the Hamster Marketplace’ presale. Unfortunately our parts were crossed with the cat. More precisely, with many digital cats from popular application CryptoKitties… So we had only one way - to connect other currencies for pre-sale re-launch at Monday, 11th of December, 14:12 Moscow time".   In CryptoKitties,users can buy and breed virtual kittens. More than 20,000 virtual cats have been bought and sold, resulting in a market cap of over $3 million.   Since all in-game transactions are based on Ethereum smart-contracts, this malfunction of the Ethereum network was caused by gamers’ activities. Due to this, the Ethereum exchange rate fell by 12%. At the same time the Bitcoin rate increased from $11300 to $15900. Ethereum representatives has stated that they are troubleshooting the issue and applying technical fixes.     Hamster Marketplace LLP company is based in United Kingdom, and is developing a decentralized shopping platform for one-of-a-kind indie-gadgets and indie-electronics from across the world.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hamster Marketplace presale moves to December 11th at 11.12 GMT due to the congestion of Ethereum blockchain  Dear Friends, the launch of the Hamster Marketplace presale was supposed to take place yesterday. Unfortunately, the cat ran across our road, so to speak. More precisely, several hundred thousand digital cats from the popular CryptoKitties application, which continues to overload the Ethereum blockchain since December 4, has delayed the launch of multiple ICO’s. The Ethereum developers' forecast for solving all problems of blockchain capacity is "a couple of weeks" at best. We were planning to launch the presale exclusively on “Ether" this Friday. This technical issue did not leave us and our project a better solution than to urgently start accepting other currencies that were previously expected to launch only on January’s Hamster Marketplace token-sale.  We are doing everything in our power to solve this as quickly as possible. However, we had to move the presale to Monday, December 11, at 11:12 GMT.  For presale only will be available: 1 250 000 HMT Which is about 6% from the total emission The discount will be: 20% Presale lasts: 20 days, until December 31, 2017

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. Very pleased with your optimism, only a pity thing that the public version of the project isn’t yet ready. At the moment, the company is just preparing to sell the coins, then to do the development of the platform.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Is it true? And yesterday a friend told me that Hamster developers are launching ICO with a ready-made platform. And when will the development begin?

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Platform development will begin only after the end of the ICO, namely from the first quarter of 2018. The developers plan to develop and test the platform before the end of the summer of 2018. The alpha version will be ready for public testing, when it will be completely technically sound and when the initial pool of vendors will be recruited - 300 manufacturers.

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And when will the official release of the platform take place so that you can buy some products on it?

Author: coldday
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The developers plan to launch the public beta version of the platform in the 4th quarter of 2018. After launching the beta version, the team of Hamster experts, it seems, will immediately begin work on the decentralized platform management system by the vendors.

Author: fgreg2692june
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Why do we need this decentralized platform management system by the vendors?

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. It will be developed by the specialists of the company until 2020, before the ICO-2020. This management system will be useful in the future for vendors who will buy the platform from the founders.

Author: fgreg2692june
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, it's understandable. Apparently, it will be a cool thing, since it will last two years. By the way, here were announced plans for 2018 and 2020, and what plans the company has for 2019?

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In 2019, through the marketing strategy, the project's founders plan to reach planned targets: at least 2000 manufacturers in the marketplace and at least 3.8 million buyers. Such indicators will allow the company to calmly conduct ICO-2020 and redeem all tokens from turnover.

Author: unkletoken
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course, testing will be conducted. Tentatively, it is scheduled for 2019. Everything will depend on the pace of development of this system. But I think that the current experienced Hamster team will be able to complete the development of the initial platform management system by the vendors much earlier.

Author: fgreg2692june
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You are right, any project for development needs a stable source of income. Despite the fact that Hamster is positioned as a non-commercial project, it will not be free for producers.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This sounds more realistic. And how much money manufacturers will pay for using the platform?

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Each manufacturer will have two payment options: either 20% of the sale amount or $ 25,000 per year. Each vendor can start working with the first option, and as soon as he will have more than $ 25,000 per year from commissions, he will be able to switch to the second version of the subscription fee.

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It seems to me that with such a commission or subscription fee, Hamster has exhausted all the advantages over the main marketplaces such as Amazon or eBay.

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You should not think so! Despite such a subscription fee, the terms of accommodation and sales on Hamster will be much more affordable than on any other comparable scale project. The Hamster market maker will allow even the smallest manufacturer to start and increase sales.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course, Hamster has a lot of other advantages over other marketplaces, especially since they do not have the highest monthly fee on the market. Hamster is more distinguished by a competitive environment for young producers who can not get it at large trading floors, where the whole market is held by giant companies and a lot of small "fringe" organizations that produce various forgeries and so on.

Author: specialAU
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I understand correctly that after the sale of the project to the vendors in 2020 they will be spared from any subscription fee?

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, you understand perfectly correctly. The only thing the vendors will need to pay is $ 50,000, which is a subscription fee for two years. This money Hamster will then spend on the redemption of the remaining token turnover.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I do not quite understand why Hamster calls himself a "business incubator"? This will also be the same marketplace as AliExpress or eBay. People will download their products and sell them, what kind of "business incubator" is it talking about?

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The most common misconception about this project) Understand that small producers cannot be pulled up on large markets. They will not be able to compete financially with large companies. Therefore, their goods there will be unclaimed. Hamster will have a trading environment only for small companies with small budgets that can easily compete with each other.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, let's say. And what does this have to do with the "business incubator"?

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The most direct. The fact is that Hamster can become a starting point for small manufacturers. Here they can collect their first target audience, accumulate the first capital to come to a large trading platform (the same AliExpress or eBay).

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And what, the vendors of this platform will be able to trade their goods on other sites?

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course, no one will limit them in this, and has no right for this. The only requirement for the administration of the marketplace is that the cost of goods in the Hamster have to be minimal and does not exceed the price at other sites.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, how many buyers want to attract project founders before launching the platform?

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It depends on how much money will be collected during the sale of coins. For example, if only a soft cup is collected, that is, 2 million US dollars, it will attract 100,000 buyers if 6 million - 500,000 buyers, 12 million - 1,400,000 buyers, 20 million - 2,600,000 buyers, 28 million - 3 800 000 buyers.

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I'm very interested in how marketers plan to attract users of exactly crowd-hosting sites? Probably buy banner ads on their websites?

Author: Gooffy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Oh, yes now there is a mass of tools that allows you to customize the display of contextual advertising to those users who visited one or another site. Well, though, the option with banner ads is also not bad)) In general, there is no specific data on Hamster's marketing strategy, so you just have to guess.

Author: robinzzon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I've read that if the vendor is going to go out to the Hamster, then he will be required to provide a link to Hamster in his description. And like this it will somehow help attract new customers to the entire marketplace. But as? If you specify a link to only one vendor.

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, you are right, only no one will be obligated, the vendors will decide whether to indicate a link to their current trading platform or not. As for attracting new users to the platform, it's very simple. Users of crowdfinding sites go to the trading platform of one manufacturer, and then begin to walk around the site and find other interesting vendors. Many of them will often return to the Hamster or even stop by every day!

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The vendors who are not quiet sure if they will be able to provide delivery by themselves, would have the opportunity use marketplace help in this. Moreover, there will be a delivery control based on blockchain technology. Vendors with poor delivery ratings will be even suspended for finding out further details.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course there will be a moderation of disputes and all conflict cases between buyer and seller by the platform.

Author: smithex
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Does you twitter bounty campaign only limited for 200 participants? Im wondering why the stastics from 201 onwards in not still updated.

Author: EasyCrazy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: How Hamster is linked with Polibius, the most great SCAM that i see in field of ICO?  In team we see Yegor Kotkin from Polibius team, it's very dangerous signal for me.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It seems to me that it is wrong that the company plans to spend the basic funds for the development of the platform. After all, it is important for them to attract as many vendors and buyers as possible. That would focus the bulk of the funds that will come with the ICO, on this matter.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: So it will be the same. The company will spend the basic funds for the marketing campaign to attract the maximum number of vendors and buyers to the platform after the first year of operation.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And what number of vendors and buyers the company's founders plan to bring to the platform in the first year of operation?

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. This will depend on what the results of the ICO will be. In general, the company plans to spend no more than $ 2,000 on attracting one manufacturer, not more than $ 7 per buyer. These figures are not taken from the ceiling, if anything. These figures are taken as a result of a deep market research of the market.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, let's say, how many vendors and buyers will be in Hamster in a year after launch, if the company collects the maximum amount of funds, that is, 28 million US dollars?

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The company's founders plan to collect 2,000 vendors and 3.8 million customers after the first year of operation. Such results will allow the company to achieve revenues of 304 million US dollars per year.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You can also get acquainted with other development plans, which depend on the amount of collected funds, on the official website of the company or in white paper on page 24!

Author: seriosman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It's very interesting how the company will spin if you can only collect a soft cup)))

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, as it is, it's hard, but it will spin)) At least the company's founders plan to complete the development of the platform, as well as mobile applications for iOS and Android.

Author: seriosman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And how they will then attract vendors and buyers to the website if they spend all the funds raised for the development of the platform and its mobile applications?

Author: gavrosh
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, obviously, that using a third-party company for shipping will increase the cost of the purchase. Is there already information about the cost of delivery services?

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Nope, there's no information yet. You don’t have to worry, the services of third-party postal services are likely to cost a penny, you will not even feel the price changes.

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There would be no problems if payment was made after receipt of the goods. That is, I would have received a purchase, confirmed it on the platform and everything, would have paid. And if the parcel had not been received or if it had come damaged, it would have paid nothing. And with the payment in advance in such a situation you will have to bathe, prove that the damaged product has got to return your money.

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: So after all the relationship between vendors and the buyer will be fixed by a smart contract. You will make money and they will be frozen in this contract until you confirm receipt of the goods.

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, if I receive a parcel, but the damaged one? How can I prove that it was not I who broke the product?

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, I think you will need to just shoot the pictures into the support service and you will receive money that is frozen in the smart contract.

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But in fact there can be such, what the vendor with photos will disagree and will dispute that it I have damaged the received gadget? Then, after all, obviously there will be some arbitration process inside the platform?

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, so far, some dubious project, at least for me from the point of view of a small manufacturer. I just do not understand yet, what a difference between Hamster and Amazon, except for a lot of competition. After all, there will be the same customers, only in a smaller amount than on large marketplaces. In general, somehow it is doubtful so far.

Author: rdizza
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Since the project will be focused on placing only innovative products, Hamster will attract to the site not customers of universal goods, but lovers of innovation, something unusual, etc. That is why every vendor will have a high demand for products.

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It's cool, of course, but how can I find my target audience in the Hamster marketplace if I release unique gadgets for cars?

Author: rdizza
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You can use the marketing tools to raise your ads in the issuance and highlight them in yellow. Very quickly thanks to these tools you will find the first buyers who will then spread the information about your gadgets and come to Hamster already exactly to YOU!

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, it's something like the network effect appears. And I can make something inside my site something like a referral program? For other users to invite friends and either receive a percentage of the amount of their purchases or discounts on future purchases?

Author: rdizza
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hmm, which, by the way, is a very cool idea, but, in my opinion, nothing like this is provided in Hamster. But this is for now, I think, in the future, the vendors will have such an opportunity.

Author: matthewtalbot
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: How much will it cost to use marketing tools in the marketplace?

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Listen, as far as I know, no such information yet. Most likely, vendors will find out about the prices after the launch of the platform. But by the way, do not forget that any vendor can use other sources of traffic: social networks, contextual advertising, etc.

Author: matthewtalbot
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, yes, of course. But I'm still interested in internal marketing tools in Hamster. And there will be some limitation on the number of their use per day, for example?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I'm still not quite sure how exactly Hamster plans to attract users who are interested in innovative gadgets that do not have regular customers yet. As if the marketing specialists of the company plan to interview each person and, if he is addicted, invite him to the platform)))

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Ahahahah, of course, the marketing strategy will look different. The main sources of traffic will be from crowdfinding sites such as Kickstarter, Indiegogo and many others. There, exactly, the majority of users are interested in new inventions.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And how much money do the founders plan to spend on attracting users from such sites?

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There are no exact figures about how much money will be spent on marketing. It is known only that it is planned to spend no more than $ 5.6-7 to attract one buyer.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Could you please specify where this information had been found? As far as I know we are planning no mark-up at all I might be wrong though.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The price list for marketing tools will be accessible to vendors only. If you are a vendor and would like to participate with our platform, please let me know to DM!

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You can see roadmap on the website where all the stages of the project development are

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The tokens will be used by vendors for special features and marketing tools primarily.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi, thanks for the message! Thank you so much for the feedback, we will keep in mind that this information is not quiet clear from the WP and fix this ASAP. Regarding your question, we will be acquiring the vendors directly contacting them, using ADs on sisal media, google ad, on kickstarter and other fundraising platforms.  There is a number of vendors we already in touch with.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don’t really understand if constant tokens purchase will occur constantly, then, what will happen when all tokens are destroyed? After all, then buyers will not be able to pay for purchases, and vendors will not be able to use marketing tools.

Author: alcoholbtc
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, I think that if the coins are destroyed, payment of crypto-currency or fiat money will operate within the platform.

Author: nicolasbit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Destroying the tokens is the right decision, so that the platform does not eventually collapse. By the time when all the coins are redeemed, the project will become a full-fledged marketplace for thousands of traders and buyers, finding the HMT in circulation will be simply unnecessary. And, as mentioned above, other payment methods can be used within the platform.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, okay, then why do they need to release tokens now, in order to spend money in the future for their ransom?

Author: alcoholbtc
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This is elementary - to get funds for the completion of the development platform and the involvement of the first vendors and buyers.

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And I generally heard that in a few years Hamster owners will disconnect the reception of tokens. It turns out, then the holders of the tokens will remain with the depreciated asset. Therefore, I do not even plan to invest in the project.

Author: nicolasbit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Actually, they will not do so that simply without warnings the HMT reception will be turned off as payment. The full withdrawal of coins from the turnover will occur in 2020, when the platform will be sold to the vendors. Then the current owners of the project will launch the final redemption, when investors can sell their tokens at a bargain price.

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And for what exactly is the advantageous price, coin holders will be able to sell their tokens?

Author: nicolasbit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, in general, now there is only an approximate estimate of the cost of tokens by 2020. If the developers get to develop the project the way they plan, then they will redeem coins somewhere at $ 50 per piece. And in general, in any scenario, the final redemption will occur at a cost more profitable, which is now, that is, more than $ 2 per piece.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I wonder when it will be known, how long will the final redemption last?

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: So in fact it is already known))) The final reverse buy-out will last 6 months. During this time, in principle, as the developers of the project expect, each remaining holder of the token will be able to sell its coins.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And what will happen in six months, when the final redemption will be completed?

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Nothing special, just the HMT tokens will be permanently removed from the platform, and the remaining coins will completely waste their value. They can not be used anywhere.

Author: gavrosh
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I do not always trust large companies when delivering my purchases, but I'll have to deal with young companies that do not yet have experience in delivering products to different countries to their customers. It seems to me that at first all buyers will have problems with getting purchases.

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Therefore, specially for this case, the marketplace will offer vendors delivery with the help of Hamster affiliate mail services. In that case, believe me, there will not be any problems with getting the purchases.

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As far as I know, Hamster's founders are planning to begin to redeem tokens before launching the beta version of the service. It means that when the first ones start to sign in on the first version of the platform, the buyback will start.

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As far as I know, Hamster's founders are planning to begin to redeem tokens before launching the beta version of the service. It means that when the first ones start to sign in on the first version of the platform, the buyback will start.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. I was reading the white paper of the project and reached the “How Hamster will attract vendors” section. There was no description of the marketing strategy, only blurred information. Therefore, I can conclude that Hamster's founders don’t understand themselves how they will attract new manufactures to the site.

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If your project is non-commercial, as far as I understand, you will not receive any benefits. Then what is your interest in creating this platform?

Author: Gooffy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: What's so hard to understand? Most likely, the company's experts will use all possible sources to search for young producers to negotiate directly with them.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Negotiate directly? Well, you know, you can negotiate to attract, at least, several vendors to the platform all the time. In general, the most sound business principle is: “don’t look for buyers in the Internet age, buyers should look for you themselves.”

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don’t think that the founders will negotiate with producers and small companies during all the curse of the existence of the platform. Hamster has just to form the first pool of vendors, and accept the first buyers after that. Then everything will work on the principle of "buzz marketing".

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: So what, do you mean that everyone will simply start telling each other about this platform after that and then the vendors will come to the marketplace themselves and ask for a place to sell their goods there?

Author: Gooffy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, that's exactly the way it works. That’s why any big marketing strategies are not necessary in this case. In fact, it is enough for founders of the company simply to use wisely the "buzz marketing ".

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As far as I know, Hamster's founders are planning to begin to redeem tokens before launching the beta version of the service. It means that when the first ones start to sign in on the first version of the platform, the buyback will start.

Author: woodcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. You write that the mark-up on goods will only take place in some cases to support the viability of the platform. You can tell, in which cases will you make the mark-up on goods of vendors?

Body: Good day to all. Is there any information, when the developers plan to start testing this platform?

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Salute! Have you determined the cost of using marketing tools on the platform?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: We would like to open new manufacturers to the world. Our CEO himself is a small vendor and he knows how that feels to be a small producer in a world of huge giant companies& tons of fakes. We want producers to leave and find their user. That's why the project is non-commercial.

Author: spottcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’m talking about at least the fact that each manufacturer will have to send the goods to customers on their own. But how will he do it if he isn’t experienced in this? As for me, I would at least suggest something to the manufacturer in this situation, for example, tell him how to do it better, to deliver as quickly and economically as possible, etc.

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If you’re talking specifically about the delivery of goods to customers, then, in fact, Hamster offers vendors two options: they can send them on their own or via the company’s partner postal service. As you can see, young businessmen won’t remain without support in this case.

Author: spottcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hm, it’s strange that I missed this point. Well, if it’s really so, that’s nice. Tell me please, does a list of postal partner services already exist? I’d like to know about the tariffs on their services.

Author: titovnn
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: What manufacturers are you working with?

Author: _ko33TPas
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As far as I know, there is still no such information at the moment. Most likely, the founders of the company are only negotiating with potential partners on the delivery of parcels now. I think we should expect appearance of a list of partners closer to launch of the platform or even after that.

Author: unkletoken
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: All in all, the delivery topic is very interesting. I'm also interested, will there be any geographical restrictions in Hamster? I mean, will there be any countries whose citizens can’t order goods from the marketplace?

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The platform won’t set any restrictions, because the company is eager to male its coverage international. The only thing that can become an obstacle for buyers of some countries is the domestic legislation. It can be, for example, either restriction on the activity of the service as a whole (it’s hardly possible), or a restriction on the goods that the buyer wants to order.

Author: unkletoken
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In All in all, it would be great if Hamster opened a huge warehouse in which all vendors could store their goods, and orders were sent from there when being bought. Then Hamster would be famous on the Internet for its sending efficiency, all competitors wouldn’t be able to match the company in this area. Do you think that anything like that may appear in the future?)

Author: specialAU
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don’t understand why one should buy coins of this project, if you still have to sell them back in 3 years. And if you don’t want to sell them, they will be depreciated, and in general you will lose everything. I believe that this isn’t quite right attitude of the project's founders to investors.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: What does it mean - why should they be bought?)) To sell them back in 3 years to the marketplace and increase your capital!!!

Author: Shaurman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: While the tokens are still in circulation, you can use them to pay for purchases and various services within the Hamster platform. And then, as it’s said above, they can be sold in 3 years. And if you don’t want to wait for three years, you can easily do the same thing on the stock exchange, after waiting for the growth rate.

Author: specialAU
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The growth of rate ... Are there any guarantees that the cost of HMT tokens will grow rather than fall?  Well, if they start to fall in price, then investors will come off the losers.

Author: Shaurman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Their rate will grow, because they will be used within the platform. This will increase the demand for coins, while the constant burning of surplus will reduce supply. For sure, this will lead to a gradual increase in these tokens’ cost.

Author: bor82t
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In my opinion, it's better to buy HTM tokens 2-3 in weeks after the ICO is over.

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello, I’m sorry, can you tell me why you think so? Will there really be any special conditions for the purchase of the remaining coins offered in 2-3 weeks after the end of the sale is over?)))

Author: bor82t
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, in fact, It’s simple. The cost of HMT tokens will fall after the end of the ICO, this is a common thing. This will happen, because tokens received free of charge by members of the bounty campaign and as well as various bonuses for participation in the ICO will be available for sale on the exchanges.

Author: bars_kz
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: Shaurman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I hasten to disappoint you, but nothing similar will happen, because Hamster will sell its coins during pre-sale and ICO without any bonuses. In addition, bounty campaign participants will receive their rewards only in 9 months after the ICO is over. Or maybe they will simply get a sum of money equivalent to the number of tokens received within the bounty.

Author: bor82t
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Heh, frankly speaking, it’s is a very interesting approach) Well, I take it back, now it's not certain that HMT tokens will fall in value in 2-3 weeks after the end of the ICO. Looks like, they’ll start to grow immediately)

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Since such a topic is discussed, I’d like to learn from you, friends, when does the company plan to start to redeem coins? I just like this idea of buyback: you buy cheaper coins on the exchange, and sell to the companies later at bigger price.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Really? Wait, but what is their direction? I read that this is a marketplace for manufacturers of gadgets and other electronics that will be able to get a separate trading platform for selling their goods.

Author: coldday
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, that's right, but Hamster won’t work with all the producers. They plan to cooperate only with small companies which just commence operation. Then a supply of unique products which are not available on Amazon and eBay will be formed.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
