Body: Yes, that's right, despite the fact that they also offer unique gadgets with innovative technologies.

Author: matthewtalbot
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, of course, it is difficult for young producers to compete with large companies for large marketplaces, but here anyone can compete for the best ratings. But I’m just wondering, what the buyers of the project

Author: coldday
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It’s good question), marketers plan to attract to the platform people that are interested in unique gadgets, innovative technologies, etc rather than those ones who is interested in universal goods, instead of attracting any buyers to the marketplace.

Author: matthewtalbot
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Oh, well, that's so cool. If you attract any people, not all of them will understand the meaning of such a project and won’t buy anything. And there’s a separate category of buyers that want to buy something unknown and useful. So to say, to discover new technologies before they become mainstream)))

Author: Mat24
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, yes, something like this. Therefore, the buyers will be happy, and young producers will find their target audience faster than they would have carry it out on any large site like Amazon.

Author: matthewtalbot
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Someone tell me please, what categories of products will be available in Hamster after launch?

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everybody. In my opinion, the company will charge too big commissions from vendors. If in a few years the first producers in Hamster reach millionths of a month's turnover, Hamster's profit will be simply huge and dishonest in relation to vendors.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And why do you think that the commission is big? 20% from each purchase is a relatively normal one. At least, sellers have to give even bigger percentage of their income to the platform in modern marketplaces.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, that’s not quite right. For example, AliExpress takers only 8% commission from sellers. eBay commission is up to 20%, but it rarely reaches this level, most often it’s 10-12%. In my opinion, if Hamster is focused on young producers, it could introduce a smaller commission.

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. I agree with you on the fact that 20% commission isn’t that small. But there is one advantage: the fact is that when the any vendor’s sales volume becomes really large, he will be able to switch to an annual subscription fee that is $25,000. Then his commission will be 0%. There’s nothing similar in other marketplaces. And by the way, vendors won’t pay either a commission or an annual subscription fee after the end of the final part of the project's development.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Won’t they pay any commission at all??  It’s something interesting. Why? And what is the final stage of the development of the service? Tell me, please)))

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The final development stage is planned for 2020, when Hamster developers will sell their project to the vendors, so that they will become complete independent. After that, there will be no commissions and subscription fees.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Will vendors redeem the project themselves? And at what price will the company's founders sell their project?

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As far as I know, is no fixed price at the moment there. It’ll be determined in 2020 at the moment of sale. Each vendor will have to pay $ 50,000 to the founders of Hamster. The price will be equal to the number of vendors that will agree to pay such a sum.

Author: unkletoken
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The idea of selling the marketplace to vendors is very interesting, they will get full freedom of action. But what will happen to the tokens remaining in circulation? In fact, there won’t be any certain company anymore, to whom will they belong?

Author: spottcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi everybody. I really like the project, there’s a lot of positive points. I think it will have a knock-on effect on the development of companies that will be able to become corporations in the future. I just wasn’t pleased with the fact that the vendors won’t be supported by administration. If I were the head of Hamster team, I would have helped young companies in the development of their business for the first time, it would be great.

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. And what do you mean when saying that the administration won’t support the vendors?

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Salute. Tell me, if I sell my products on Hamster, will you let me open a campaign to raise funds on Kickstarter?

Author: nicolasbit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello, comrades. I have read that Hamster will do a manual check of all vendors’ goods by developers. I was wondering, when sending samples for examination will they need to provide some additional documents related to the production?

Author: fgreg2692june
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon everyone. Tell me, if it’s not difficult, will Hamster have some global ranking? What criteria it will be formed with?

Author: coldday
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Have you decided yet, what the searching form for will be like? I'm just wondering with what criteria will they be able to search for products in the marketplace.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, HMT tokens are not mineable

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This is a brilliant idea and we will implement it

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The tokens will be paid out accordingly to the nominal price

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There’s just been a lot of marketplaces and each of them is a kind of cool then the others. Does it make any sense to open one more? And starting ICO of such a project is absurd. I don’t even want to read anything ‘cause it’s just another platitude. A bunch of manufactures will gather in one place, churn out similar goods and say that they’re the best.

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Uh, you should read at least anything about Hamster before saying it’s “a platitude” and etc. By the way, if you didn’t know, this platform will focus on cooperation only with manufactures of innovative gadgets and indie-devices.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: What does it matter? Ok, the marketplace is focused on any certain categories of goods, and so what? Anyway, there won’t be any diversity, unique goods and cool innovations, that’s why I see no reason in such a project. IMHO.

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Listen, Hamster is a marketplace for small manufactures which a ready to offer to the market useful and innovative gadgets. That’s why the platform can claim that it will offer really interesting goods to the buyers.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Let’s suppose it’s really so. But what made the developers decide that small manufactures having really cool goods will come to Hamster rather than to a place like Amazon or eBay, where there’re much more buyers?

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Because small companies face the competition of giant ones which keep the market "below themselves". They have no financial means to compete with them, so their interesting and unique products lack paying attention. Hamster will gather such sellers in one place and find buyers who are interested in modern technologies and innovations for them.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, it looks really interesting. A place with unique goods from companies which are only eager to prove themselves. I think it’s an interesting project. I’ll follow its development.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, what did you want, indeed?) The most important thing is that only really useful and worthwhile goods will be placed on the platform, and useless goods won’t.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, the developers have set ambitious goals. Not everyone would dare compete with digital trading giants like Amazon and eBay. Well, I think if they will act according to their plan, they’ll be able to achieve something and chop off a part of the market for themselves.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hmm, tell me please, how does the company plan to monitor the process of placing goods in order to ensure the platform with high-quality goods to be placed on rather than fakes?

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hamster’s experts will manually check each product of a new vendor who wants to join the marketplace. The administration won’t allow the vendors to work on Hamster without being checked.

Author: coldday
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Wait, but why Amazon and eBay and others? Hamster isn’t going to compete with them because it’ll work in another direction.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But this is a huge amount of work that must be done. How do the company's experts plan to deal with it?

Author: sinfazat22ron
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi everyone! Tell me, will it be possible to buy coins, paying with a credit card?

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. No, we accept payments only in cryptocurrency. The full list can be found on the official website of the project.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don't understand why Hamster is better than small companies with innovation, which are using marketing tools? You can spend the same $25,000 per year on a marketing campaign and get much more buyers than on the new marketplace.

Author: jager44
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Right, companies with innovation, that nobody has ever used. The target audience for such products is not formed, yet, so the owners of such organizations don’t even know on what trading platform they should promote their projects and what tools to use.

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, you can study the market, define your customers and then focus your ads on them, can’t you?

Author: jager44
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: To define the audience in yet not created niche, you need to do the huge amount of work. Marketing specialists take enormous amount of money which exceed $25000 that vendors will pay in Hamster.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And then why should the targeted audience appear in Hamster, if it’s nowhere else?

Author: jager44
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The fact is that the developers of Hamster will attract customers, that are interested in innovative gadgets and want to try something new, to their platform. It would be easier for small companies to select their target audience in that environment.

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Indeed, this sounds very interesting, but I have a question: how Hamster’s marketers will determine the potential buyers who are interested not in universal products, but in innovative ones?

Author: Gooffy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Heyyy! Thank you appreciate your support!

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, definitely! There will be lots of other indicators which will be based on the blockchain technology: quality control, shipping speed and many others.

Author: coldday
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, this must be done before the start of the pre-sale. The procedure takes no more than 2 or 3 minutes.

Author: HamsterMarketplace

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everyone. There is a point in the white paper of the marketplace that claims that there will be a transparent account of the defected goods maintained on the platform. Can someone explain what does it mean?

Author: woodcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I believe that the problem of most modern marketplaces is buying reviews. Will experts of the Hamster company somehow struggle against it? I’d like to hear what methods they will use for this purpose.

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’ve just learned that the developers of the project plan to attract customers to the platform independently. And what criteria will be used to select the target audience?

Author: robinzzon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon. My team is engaged in the production of small gadgets that complement the work of iPhones. I’ve read that only the manufacturers of innovative gadgets will be involved in the platform. I’m wondering how the vendors will be evaluated whether they produce innovative gadgets or some mediocre devices.

Author: Veecker
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I did not quite understand why the company should keep the tokens which are earned by bounty campaign participants for 9 months. If there are any experienced users, please explain my for what purpose will this be done?

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everyone. I try to understand correctly if a company starts to sell its goods, will it have the right to do it on the other platforms?

Author: Mat24
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Why do you think so? Hamster doesn’t limit the ability of manufacturers to place goods on the other platforms. The only thing they require is that they don’t increase the price of their products in Hamster unreasonably.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But why is it often written in the description that the unique products will be sold only on this marketplace and nowhere else?

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Most likely, this is a figurative expression, because young manufacturers find it difficult to develop themselves on large trading platforms such as Amazon or eBay, so the only alternative for them is Hamster.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And how will the company's specialists determine that the Hamster manufacturer has set the price higher than elsewhere? I’m not sure if they are going to check hundreds of other marketplaces.

Author: Mat24
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: That's right. There will be a special algorithm that will track the goods from Hamster on other platforms. It will be able to compare prices and, if somewhere the cost is less for the same product, algorithm will automatically adjust it.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’m interested if there is a possibility that the vendor will be able to hide from the algorithm its products on other platforms, so that the system couldn’t change the price for the vendor's products in Hamster?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. Do users have an opportunity to mine HMT tokens?

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. HMT coins can’t be mined. You can get them only on the ICO.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Thanks for reaching us out, please send the email to info@hmstr.io and my colleague will provide you with all applicable information.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The users who hold HMT tokens will have an access to the closed pre-sales of new products, they will also receive information about the vendors who we are planning to connect to the platform and to the list of those who haven't passed verification and many others.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There will be a referral program available

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Similar doesn't mean copies We will allow them

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: All unsold tokens will be burnt.

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It is very admirable, that Hamster wants to develop its international activity, to open warehouses for this purpose via its partners. But this is a disadvantages. It turns out that they will need to spend their own money to deliver their products to Hamster warehouses.

Author: superwallet
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Why do you think so? There won’t be anything like this in Hamster. Each manufacturer will be able to deliver the goods directly to the customers. If they don’t have such an opportunity, the marketplace is ready to offer the services of its partner delivery services, which will offer the vendors favorable conditions for sending the products to customers.

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It is very good. If the company offers such assistance to marketplace manufactures, it means that they will be able to offer their products at an even lower price. The only thing in this case which doesn’t make me happy is that they will have to conclude numerous contracts with companies that will help them to carry out delivery.

Author: superwallet
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You’re mistaken again. As far as I know, their cooperation will be fixed not by a complicated contract. And all in all, maybe in the future developers will add an option for vendors and partner delivery services to work via smart contracts. This will make the process as simple as it is possible.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Tell me please, will the contact details of the traders be indicated on the trading platforms of vendors?

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. If I'm not mistaken, then vendors will post all contact information on their sites so that any Hamster user can contact them. And anyway, they will be able to customize their sites as they want to.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’m wondering if there will be any requirements for the manufacturers for packing the goods?

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There is no information on this subject. I don’t think that there will be any serious demands. Most likely, vendors will be required for the packaging to be reliable, so that it can protect gadgets from damage during delivery.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It seems to me that it isn’t worth giving full independence to young producers when setting up a trading platform. They can do something wrong because they are inexperienced, it will lead to great difficulties in their development. I believe that they should still be somehow controlled by the platform administration!

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Despite full independence in the vendors’ management of the trading platform, the project specialists will still control which goods and what information is published. And yet, each vendor will be able to contact support team to ask for advice on how to better arrange a trading platform.

Author: whatisthis
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: interesting project, is the presale over or is it still running? Looking forward to see more frequent updates here.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Then it's cool. This means that vendors won’t have to spend a lot of money on packaging and they will have more free funds that they can spend on developing their companies and improving production.

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I love projects in which the team is ready to communicate with their customers and help them develop. By the way, what languages will support agents speak?

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I haven’t encountered such information anywhere yet, but I hope that the project developers will hire support service agents that will be able to communicate with the platform users using as many languages as possible.

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Tell me what you think, will the support service work only in text mode or can they communicate using voice? As for me, for example, I perceive information better when I communicate with a person with the use of voice, rather than text messages.

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You provide us with very interesting calculations. But it seems to me that the vendor who has just arrived to the site will find it difficult to compete with those who already make 100 sales a per month. Therefore, they can spend much more money on marketing than beginners.

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes that’s right. I think that developers will make some restrictions on the use of marketing tools to at least somehow level the capabilities of manufacturers. For example, each vendor will be able to raise their ads no more than 3 days in advance. Then everyone will have time to do it and get their clientele.

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: That would be really cool! By the way, is there still no information about the full list of marketing tools that will be available in Hamster? I’ve just heard only about highlighting ads and coloring them in the list.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’ve read that you plan to have each product on the platform unique, and without any copies. And if two small companies release similar gadgets and are competitors, you won’t allow one of them to use your site?

Author: Sladostrsthij
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And is your project awakening to the EtnerDelta exchange? tckb lf nj Gülf?

Author: spottcoin

Body: Hello. Can Investors during the ICO count on any discounts or bonuses?

Author: newboi

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Tell me please, if I sell my products on your site, can I simultaneously do it in other marketplaces? It’s a way to increase my clientele and income.

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. I’m wondering how much time you will have to finish the development of the platform and release it? I can’t wait to see what goods can be bought there.

Author: Bit_fan_talks

Author: polonium84
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Will you test your site before its launch? I’d like very much to take part in it. And I wouldn’t refuse to get bonuses for this)))

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good day everybody. I don’t quite understand why the developers position Hamster as a non-commercial project. Can someone explain this to me?

Author: robinzzon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good day everybody. I’ve read the information about the fact that each vendor can use the Hamster’s delivery service to deliver the goods to the buyer. And how much will it cost?

Body: Why are HMT tokens act as a debt payable by Hamster to the coin holders?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The default currency on the platform will be fiat, however if the vendor accepts tokens, you will be able to buy using them

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This payment is not possible to divid into two parts and has to proceeded right away

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: all the numbers we use are carefully calculated, therefore, reaching 300 vendors is not that hard as it might seem. If we focus primarily on marketing and make this space attractive for smaller vendors, there is definitely no need to worry about this. Moreover, we will keep you updated on this.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The development of the platform is not possible without funds, so unfortunately it won't start. Or maybe we will find the way... Who knows

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: There will be a lot of information accessible to public, but only HMT token holders will have an access to very private info. More about this in our new WP version

Author: sarul
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I'm sorry, but is that works like required to pay some HMT or it's require an user must holding some token to access the private info ? or that's was special ability for HMT token holders?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The ICO won't be extended, and yes, unsold tokens will be burnt.

Author: Mat24
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello, will you provide any kind of non-material support to young producers? For example, something like assisting in the formation of a patent for a vendor’s product, if it is truly unique.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hamster has a very interesting description, but I believe that eBay offers similar services. I just often buy something there and I always come across some interesting developments of small companies. Hence, eBay also somehow helps the beginning manufacturers, and also there’re of course a huge number of buyers.

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. eBay doesn’t have a purpose to contribute to the development of small companies as Hamster does. Yes, there are unique developments from DIY-companies, because developers simply have nowhere else to go. But because of the large number of different fakes, unique products are lost on eBay. Such a situation won’t take place in Hamster.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But after all, any manufacturer on eBay can use the marketing tools increase the rating. Then he will have access to a huge audience and increase his sales.

Author: Gamelander
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The audience on eBay is mainly interested in universal goods, they’re not interested in innovations. Among the buyers on Hamster there will be just those who are interested in unique things, so each manufacturer will increase the conversion. As for the use of marketing tools on eBay by young companies, they won’t compete with large companies that spend millions of dollars on advertising. In Hamster, all the sellers will work on equal terms.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Does anyone know will the Hamster accept for payment for Ripple coins?

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But can’t a large producer come to Hamster and simply win all the competition? Then the situation will become similar and small companies won’t be able to find their audience.

Author: sinfazat22ron
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello, yes, it will. By the way, they generally take a lot of currencies as a payment. If you are interested, you can view an official site.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Well, as far as I know, only small companies will be allowed to use Hamster. Large organizations won’t have an access to the platform. That’s why everyone will be in the same situation, as it was already mentioned above.

Author: foreverman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Is it true that unregistered users will be able to buy tokens only on the exchange? Will this somehow affect the rate of coins?

Author: _ko33TPas
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. The value of coins won’t be affected; you can buy them also at a price of $2 per piece. Perhaps, you’ll only have to pay an additional commission which will be charged by the crypto exchange.

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I welcome all the readers of the forum. Tell me please, what will happen to the tokens that won’t be purchased during the ICO?

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. As far as I know, unsold tokens will be destroyed

Author: specialAU
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Tell me please, if I sell my products on your site, can I simultaneously do it in other marketplaces? It’s a way to increase my clientele and income.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It’s interesting. It is said that Hamster is a place only for small manufacturers who can’t get their first sales. And if I have a small production and a small online store with about 50 sales a month, can I get into this marketplace in order to promote my products?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. I’ve read that you are planning to make a minimum mark-up on the products of producers to ensure the life of the platform. So if you collect the commission from them, so should you add mark-up?

Author: seriosman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No one has said anything about it yet, but I think that it is still difficult for developers to predict this. They need somehow to actually evaluate everything and then make a decision.

Author: unkletoken
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If you think that the major marketplaces have already irretrievably grown out of your niche, then who will be your main competitors? After all, it’s impossible to avoid competitors at all)))

Author: ggcript
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In this case you can use math a little: first, companies pay 20% of each sale in the form of a commission, and then can switch to a monthly fee of $ 25,000 per year, when the amount of the  commission for the same period exceeds this amount. Let's say the average cost of a product is $ 100. Vendor pays a commission of $20 per sale. He needs to sell 1250 products per year or a little more than 100 of them per month to accumulate $ 25,000. With this nember of sales the company won’t be kicked out of the marketplace. As a matter of principle, 100 sales per day is not much. Therefore, I believe that vendors can be excluded from the platform with sales volume of approximately 2500-3500 units per year. But this is only my subjective opinion, let's see how it will turn out.

Author: ELE.ZYK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: if not reach cap after 4 weeks ,will you extend ICO ,and how about unsold tokens,will burn?

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If I understand correctly, you can pay for purchases in Hamster both with HMT coins and other currencies. Can one get a reduction in commission costs when paying for the purchase with tokens?

Author: seriosman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. The developers promise that you’ll receive discounts from manufacturers when paying for purchases with HMT tokens.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It should be really interesting at the start of the marketplace’s operation: unknown manufacturers with cool and useful goods, excellent competition and much more. But what will happen over time? Vendors will develop to the level of "big" players and then new small manufactures won’t be able to win their competition in Hamster. Then Hamster will turn into what Amazon is now, and lose its main idea ((

Author: nicolasbit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And do you know that Hamster isn’t a permanent marketplace for companies? The developers position it as an intermediate stage between Kikcstarter and Amazon. It means that when certain results are achieved, the manufacturer leaves Hamster and moves to a site like Amazon in order to offer his products to a wider audience. Therefore, there will be no problems with the development of new small producers.

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good day to all the readers of the forum. I would like to ask whether the vendor will be able to divide the payment of $50,000 which will have to be paid by the founder of the marketplace in 2020, into several parts and pay it within 1-2 years?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And how will the process of transition of an already large company from Hamster to Amazon take place? Will it be compulsory or by choice? If a manufacturer has a choice, can a company go to Amazon and at the same time stay on Hamster? After all, who wants to lose potential buyers, even if there’re little of them...

Author: seriosman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon. It seems to me I’ve heard that the process of leaving Hamster will be forced. So when the vendor reaches certain financial results, he is asked to leave the marketplace, in order to prevent him to hamper the development of other young companies. Therefore, the platform should be supported by constant competition between small companies, large organizations don’t belong here.

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It is very interesting at what financial results will the company be "expelled" from Hamster. Friends, does anyone have this information? This point became really interesting to me)))

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I was very surprised when I’ve learned that the launch of the platform will take place only after there will be 300 manufacturers on it! Don’t you think that this is too much and it can take a long time to reach this mark? I'm just worried that the launch of the platform because of this can be delayed.

Author: gavrosh
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You said that if you collect less than $ 2 million during the sale of tokens, you will return all the funds to investors. In this case, won’t development of the platform continue or will you do it on your own money?

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings to everybody. Does anyone know what information can be learned about the manufacturer? I would like, for example, to know how many defective products were sold by a particular vendor during all the period during which he was working on Hamster.

Author: dort

Body: According to Hamster's strategy, it turns out that HMT coins will be in circulation for 3 years. I'm wondering if the company's founders will conduct enabling activities to increase the value of tokens? What will they be like?

Author: tool_462

Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: devilini

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics

It is clearly written that each manufacturer can choose an alternative: they can pay 20% of each sale to the platform, but not more than $20.

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Yes, I somehow didn’t notice this information. I'm wondering if a vendor can choose an option of commission payment from each sale, and then, after he has been working for some time on the platform, change the subscription fee to $25,000 per year for a place on the site when registering?

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, of course! This is the very idea of the project’s developers. So the young manufacturer first pays the commission from each sale. Then, when commission costs become more than $ 25,000 per year, each vendor can switch to a fixed monthly fee.

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You explained everything very well, thank you. I found the information about the sale of the marketplace to the vendors when getting acquainted with the white paper of the project. Did I understand correctly that after the sale of the platform vendors won’t pay any fees or subscription fees?

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good day everybody. I'm very interested in buying HMT coins, so I’m wondering if I will receive any information about the development of the platform.

Body: Hello. I can’t say anything about receiving information, but you will definitely get an early access to testing the platform. This option will be available only to the holders of the tokens.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everybody. How long will Hamster’s ICO last?

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello, my friend. Hamster’s ICO will last for 4 weeks. It can end earlier if a hard cup level is reached

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’m wondering, how will the new vendors get into the marketplace after the sale of the company in 2020? Everything is clear if this happens now, but I can’t even imagine what will happen in the future.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You still have time to join registration! Otherwise you will be able to buy tokens on the exchanges

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, we will have agents sorting out all dispute issues

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Thanks for your point. We have decided to make an additional section about the team on the web, because we are huuuuge

Author: aidit45@gmail.com
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: that is right you can find the teams in the website. when the token sale begin detail, I seen the project has long lived

Author: ber68dclass
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As for me, I believe that such a trading platform doesn’t differ from large sites like Amazon or eBay. If there is a huge competition among major manufacturers, then here will be a huge competition among small manufacturers. And how will they overcome the popularity of their competitors, if the platform doesn’t have any opportunities for this? It’s unclear.

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Actually, the difference between Hamster and large sites is great. Marketing tools, standard for similar projects, will be present on the platform. In particular, vendors will have an opportunity to raise their ads in the issuance, highlight with color and much more. Based on this, they can create the first marketing strategies and gain invaluable experience

Author: ber68dclass
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: But it is clearly written in the description of the project that small companies don’t have extra money to struggle against competitors and pay marketing costs. And now, it turns out that there are marketing tools for which you need to pay in order to win a competition from a dozen competitors. Where can vendors get so much money?

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Listen, in my opinion, the impossibility to pay marketing costs was described in the description of Hamster in the context of competition with large producers who spend millions of dollars on marketing. All companies on this site will be small, they will have a similar marketing budget. In addition developers don’t want to set high prices for these services in order to encourage the development of young companies. Everything will have the lowest possible cost.

Author: ber68dclass
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Weeeell, now it becomes clearer to me. All in all, if you consider this situation, it’s right. Indeed, the vendors will be able to get not only the first profit, but also the first marketing experience within Hamster! It's great, I like it.

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everyone. Since we are talking about low marketing costs on the Hamster platform, then maybe you have information about what goods will there be and how much will it cost? I think it will be interesting for potential vendors.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Of course, it's great that every vendor gets a platform with complete independence, that he can make the adjustments that he needs. But I’m afraid that some of them will begin to enjoy complete independence and create some shadow schemes, arrange illegal deals, etc. This is a usual case if there is no control.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Your fears wouldn’t have been in vain if the Hamster platform was centralized, but this project tends toward a decentralized model. All activities will be carried out on the basis of the Emercoin blockchain, via which it is possible to monitor the transparency of decisions made by the manufacturer and the reliability of control over their execution. Thus, the possibility of fraud is excluded.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Let's say that the blockchain system will allow you monitoring all reports about the vendor's work, but how can this technology determine that the manufacturer sells the illegal goods? It follows that you need some control over the products, but there isn’t any, because the vendors are working in complete independence.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You don’t need to worry about this either. Each product that will be exhibited by the vendor on its trading floor will be subject to a manual check by Hamster specialists. This approach excludes the possibility that the manufacturer will sell something illegal. As you can see, everything was planned well.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It's great that the creators are so responsive to their work and arranged a manual check of each product. But I wonder how long will it take. After all, in case of presence of a large number of vendors on the site, this check can take a long time.

Author: PHAN THANH PHONG
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: May I Know the exactly time when you presale?

Author: shara
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Why did you decide to give out tokens to bounty campaign participants only in 9 months after the end of the ICO? I think this will scare many users who could advertise your project.

Author: matthewtalbot
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. If you manage to collect only a minimal amount of money on the sale of coins, will the functionality of the platform be severely curtailed?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: We will announce the date very soon, pre-sale is about to start in December!

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The main reason was the fact that after bounty participants get their tokens, they sell it right away, which drops token's rate a lot. In order not to be victims of this fact, we have decided to provide bounty participants with 2 options: 1) money right away in fiat; 2) tokens frozen for 6 months

Author: bor82t
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In addition, Amazon is mainly focused on the American market, and vendors, who have a real unique, useful and cool product need to have buyers all over the world in order to determine their target audience as soon as possible.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: And there’re also a large number of goods and large producers. Competition is everywhere; do you think there won’t be any in Hamster? Amazon offers manufacturers a lot of marketing tools due to which they can promote their brand. Will there be anything like that in Hamster?

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everyone. Does Hamster plan to sell all the emission of tokens during the ICO?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, Hamster will have marketing tools to promote its company. But don’t you think how much does advertising cost in Amazon? It is calculated there as a large sum with five or even six zeros. Even the young producers who have automated production simply can’t afford it. Therefore, they don’t achieve and won’t achieve there any success.

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, it doesn’t, only 70% of the total volume of coins will be put up for sale. 27.5% will remain for members of Hamster team and 2.5% will be spent on bonus payments to the participants of the bounty campaign.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As far as I know young companies can gain popularity due to positive feedback in Amazon. That is, you make some good sales, get the first reviews and then the exponential growth starts. You can even avoid spending money on marketing tools.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I wonder how a young producer with five positive reviews will be able to get ahead of the issuance of a company that has ten thousand positive reviews? In addition, a lot of Amazon’s positive reviews are bought, and every feedback about the companies in Hamster will be checked by Hamster agents.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It’s a very cool idea, guys! Some of my friends came up with cool gadgets for everyday use, but couldn’t move forward due to the fact that they did not have a place like Hamster. I just don’t like the fact that you haven’t worked out an issue of delivery of goods from sellers to buyers, especially if they are in different countries.

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The question has been worked out. Each vendor gets an opportunity to be engaged independently in not only selling their products, but also arranging the delivery of goods to their customers. This will become an invaluable experience for them, especially as long as there are not so many sales. Many companies don’t cope with delivery due to lack of experience when a flurry of orders falls on them.

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’ve read that every vendor will have an opportunity to deliver their products on their own. That's what embarrasses me, because the likelihood of fraud is high. Buyers of goods will pay for the goods, the vendor will fade away and they will remain deceived, which can shake the confidence of the users to all the young companies that are developing in Hamster.

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Oh, so is this the question that bothers you? First, the platform will help resolve disputes between the seller and the buyer. Secondly, each purchase will be carried out via a smart contract. The funds for the goods will be blocked in it until the buyer confirms the receipt of their goods. Thirdly, if a small manufacturer isn’t sure that he is able to deliver a product on his own at the moment, he can use Hamster's partner delivery service.

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It's strange that I didn’t find information about the partner delivery service myself. And do you know how much will this service cost in the marketplace? I'm just planning to place my products on Hamster and at the moment I'm trying to calculate all possible costs.

Author: Eric.Lichmann
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: What will happen if the buyer receives his purchase but intends to say that he has not received anything in order to return his money? How can the vendor defend his rights and get honestly earned money?

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello, comrades. Tell me please, how can I buy HMT tokens if I fail to pre-register?

Author: deort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: If you have no time to pre-register, you can buy coins on crypto-exchanges about which Hamster developers will notify us later. But there is still a preliminary registration, so you still can pass it.

Author: oliverlott
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon. How long will the main round of Hamster's ICO last?

Author: mirsad786
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. ICO will last for 4 weeks exactly. But it will end sooner if the company collects a hard cup.

Author: INDI81free4
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon. I’ve read your white paper very carefully and didn’t quite understand if you consider Amazon and Kickstarter to be your competitors. Well, this is a bold challenge, but if you carry out everything that was planned, I think you will be able to get ahead of them.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hey, thanks for the kind words no, we don't consider them to be our competitors.  The sales of unique gadgets has really small volumes for them and those giant marketplaces are not aimed on acquiring smaller vendors. Moreover they have quite unfriendly conditions for those.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: YEs, exactly, ICO will last 4 weeks or until hard cap is reached

Author: _ko33TPas
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It all sounds cool, but why are you so confident? After all, companies that are only engaged in "copying" the famous brands and selling products of poor quality can come to the site instead of promising ones.

Author: app2endad
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don’t think that the creators of the project didn’t consider this in their plans. They will obviously have some methods to get rid of such manufacturers on their platform.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You’re right because the creators of Hamster will conduct manual moderation of each vendor who wants to work in their marketplace. I'll tell you even more, they are going to independently assess the quality of products of manufacturers who want to cooperate with Hamster.

Author: foreverman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: This is a serious approach to the matter. But can’t such a routine verification process lead to a slowdown in the number of vendors on the site and, as a consequence, slow the growth of the whole company?

Author: app2endad
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It looks great, finally there’re projects that will help environmental friendly electricity to become more profitable then the energy that is got from fossil fuels. But I can’t understand how will the seller transfer it to other people?

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’m wondering on what services of the marketplace I can spend tokens. Can anyone tell me about this?

Author: rdizza
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Forum readers, do you think that vendors may get the opportunity to raise funds from fans for the development of their company in Hamster?

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Do you really think that before the final buy-back of the tokens, their cost will be $ 50 per unit? Can you tell us, on the basis of what data did you make such a forecast?

Author: gazman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I wonder what will the developers do if none of the holders wants to sell the tokens until the final redemption when their value is predicted to be  $ 50?

Author: robinzzon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi, I have a question. If a large company wants to sell its products on your site, will you give it access?

Author: Veecker
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: As I understood, there will be high competition among vendors in Hamster. What marketing tools can they use to increase their sales?

Author: Crypto_Enthusiast
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi Dev, the idea looks good. But why in the white paper there is no information about the team - advisors, investors, developers?

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. You guarantee that there will be no intermediaries between the manufacturers and the buyers. And how do you determine that the person that wants to become a vendor is a manufacturer but not an intermediary who resells the goods of someone else's production?

Author: rocketbit48
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You say that you plan to provide small producers with a steady stream of customers and then that modern buyers buy goods on major Internet sites because of the habit. How do you plan to attract customers to the platform if you know about their habits?

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You write that the vendors will have complete independence in Hamster. They will be able to customize their trading platforms as they want to. And yet, is there some sort of rules with restrictions that are imposed on vendors? Where can one find them?

Author: kentuckykid
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. Will everybody be able to participate in pre-sale or is a pre-registration needed? Well, some projects do require a pre-registration.

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, you will need to sign up for pre-sale. In order to do this, go to the main page of the company's website and click the "Subscribe to get pre-sale access" button.

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I’ve read in the description of the marketplace that each manufacturer will deliver the goods to the buyer on their own. And if the buyer pays his bill but doesn’t receive his goods within a certain period of time, can you resolve the dispute with the vendor? How much does this service cost to the buyer?

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Frankly speaking, for me this project seems to be just a copy of the well-known Amazon. There It’s even easier to operate for young producers since this service is used by much more users. Thus, young producers are gradually gaining first sales there and are becoming famous.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Do you really think so??? How can you compare the marketplace which is aimed only at small companies to a trading platform, where the goods are offered by real giants with a big name, whose competition is simply can’t be won? Unique goods get simply lost there because of the huge assortment of a lot of useless things.

Author: woodcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Is it possible that with the growth of the popularity of the marketplace, large companies will "come here" and harass young producers in competition?

Author: polonium84
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I don’t quite understand, will the vendors pay 20% or $20 per each sale? Or can they choose between these two options?

Author: RebeccaFrei
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello? Wait for answer!) And also i have one more question about do you have some pre agreements with electronics producers which are interested in your project?

Author: newboi
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello to everybody. I did not find information about what crypto currency can be used to buy HMT tokens. Can you tell me, please?

Author: Shaurman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, of course. I can tell you that the list of available crypto-currencies for paying for the purchase of tokens is large. Open  the official website of the project, all the information is at the top of the main page.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings to everybody. I looked through the information on the project, it is very doubtful that low prices will be offered here! After all, how can one understand that the price for the goods is objective if there’s nothing to be compared with? I think that many vendors will overestimate their goods in order to earn more money.

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It would be unfortunately if the developers of the marketplace didn’t take care about this. They will set up a semi-automatic algorithm that will guarantee the lowest prices in Hamster.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: How will he do this? Will semi-automatic algorithm be able to estimate the cost of goods and set an objective price? It’s hard to imagine the effectiveness of such an algorithm.

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: You should not think like that. Hamster will have a robot that will parse all the sites where vendors will sell their goods. It will set the lowest cost of goods in automatic mode because of focusing on other areas.

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In addition, if the robot finds a price deviation of more than 10%, manual moderation will be added to avoid mistakes and malicious intent.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: We are thinking about using this option too.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good question, however it is not possible, because of the fact that we are aimed only at niche vendors and are not planning to register bigger giants on the platform

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hi, you can find the list of the currencies on our web hmstr.io, it is going to be more than 10 coins, including wave, btc, ethereum etc..

Author: spottcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon. Let’s say the marketplace will be moderated by vendors, or anyone can start to trade in Hamster. I could not find any information about this, and I think that there will be a lot of goods of poor quality without moderation.

Author: specialAU
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Good afternoon. When will the information on the timing of pre-sale appear?

Author: advertkane121
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Greetings. The developers said that they will tell us about the beginning of pre-sale in the last week of November, that’s very soon!

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. How many HMT tokens do you want to leave in circulation, when carrying out a buyback?

Author: celkaris
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I'm going to invest in this projec

Author: foreverman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Why do developers predict that there will unique products sold in their marketplace?

Author: app2endad
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Everything is simple: the project plans to attract young companies that don’t have enough funds to drive out competitors of major marketplaces to the site. They will be able to offer their unique products in Hamster.

Author: alcoholbtc
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Does anyone know when the decision concerning the delay with which will the participants of the bounty campaign receive tokens will be made? Will it happen in 9 months or after launching the beta version of the platform?

Author: energycrypt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It's a pity that everything is so prolonged, it’s a very good project, I want to quickly evaluate all its possibilities. Will testing of the decentralized version of the platform be carried out? Simple users like me can take part in it?

Author: seriosman
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello everyone. I read that the company plans to organize a buy-back of tokens in the future, but I haven’t found information about when it will begin. Can you tell me the time limits of the beginning of the buy-back?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: We will be buying as many tokens as possible accordingly to the profit the marketplace makes.

Author: slaman29
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Sorry to ask this here, I tried to look back at old posts and on Google but couldn't find exact answers, so apologies if this has been asked before. This is a UK-based startup, does that mean that at some point, others from foreign countries like myself will one day have to perform verification measures for KYC? I like the idea of decentralized marketplaces since so many sellers on Amazon and such always restrict shipping to my country. Will Hamster address this issue?  I know Asians are not a big market yet, but spending power is increasing and electronics are very hot on the demand right now.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The company will be self-managed by the vendors

Author: Mops
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: What can I do with HMT tokens before launching the beta version of the platform? Or do I still have to wait for its launch?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Your question is more than welcomed, this is what this topics is crated for, so I can response to your questions.  Everyone who would like to invest in our ICO will have to pass KYC.  We are aware of the asian market which actually is quite big and definitely planning to shipping there!

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It is interesting to know what the creators of the project plan to spend most of the funds that will be received during the ICO on?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The tokens can be used in 3 ways:  1) on the platform 2) for trading on the exchanges 3) for the buy-back of the tokens by HMSTR  It's up to you how to use them

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Most of the funds will be spent on marketing and acquiring new vendors and buyers on the platform

Author: Gabrola
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Is it true it will be spent about $ 2000 on attracting one vendor to the platform? Who was involved in this calculation and on the basis of what data was it conducted?

Author: RebeccaFrei
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello! Do you have any predictions of percentage increases of HMT for any period? Also, i'm waiting for announcement of ICO start))

Author: nothappend
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Finally, I will get rid of the "garbage" counterfeits from China and I can really get something interesting with the help of Hamster! Have Hamster marketers already calculated how many sellers will they be able to attract to the platform during the first year of operation and how many products will they be able to offer?

Author: Gabteb
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: i have heard about this project and also have seen on facebook but its intersting it has not so much replies here on bitcointalk where you have very nice ANN with good graphic.

Author: dort
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: How many sellers will you need to have in order to start the platform, or doesn’t it matter?

Author: 10000BTC
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: How large is your market?

Author: waitsummer
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hello. Tell me, please, may your plans to sell Hamster to vendors change as the company develops? For example, can you decide to sell it not in 2020, but a little later?

Author: g8stTDas
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: I was very pleased that manufacturers will have an opportunity to get feedback from customers via blockchain voting. Is there any limit concerning this option? For example, restrictions on the maximum number of votings launched per month?

Author: bars_kz
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Will vendors have any opportunity to issue discount cards or coupons for their customers within the platform?

Author: MadduckUK
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: In listing of how many exchanges will the HMT tokens be added?

Author: thelastofas
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Will investors receive purchased tokens immediately after paying for them or after the end of the ICO?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Yes, of course! Our econimic activity is fully legal and we will be ready to provide authorities with the information in case of an official inquiry

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: No, however vendors will have other useful ways to use tokens, for example internal marketing or some other things which we are writing about in our new redaction of whitepaper

Author: woodcoin
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Will users be able to transfer tokens to each other within the platform? Will the commission be charged for this?

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: We are located in Birmingham, Great Britain and Moscow, Russia

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: These tokens will be burnt

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: It is closed ICO, which means that in order to participate you really need to sign at our web:  hmstr.io   Otherwise there is no possibility to purchase

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Right after the end of the ICO we will be on decentralized exchange Etherdelta, at the same time we are communicating with other exchanges as well. It is not possible to share the details yet, but we are doing everything possible to get listing on the best exchanges.

Author: rdizza

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: The main problem of many projects is the big bonuses for investors in the form of free tokens, because of which the fall of the course begins after the end of the ICO. The creators of Hamster solved it simply – they refused any bonuses for investors, only one option is available - the purchase of tokens at $2 per token.

Author: spacegt
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Ok, let’s say I got it. And what about free tokens that bounty campaign participants will receive? After all, they can also affect the decline in the rate of tokens.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: That’s right, I forgot to tell you about this at once, because there was also a solution for this problem. The creators of Hamster offer bounty campaign participants a cash payment equivalent to the number of tokens that they have earned. The second option is the issue of tokens with a delay.

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Hamster Marketplace is a non-profit decentralised trading platform, aimed at the sale of niche electronics and unique gadgets from novice and local producers without involving middlemen. Hamster Marketplace will open markets to thousands of vendors around the world who cannot currently afford entry to them. It will also offer millions of buyers one-of-a-kind goods without a middleman’s markup because the marketplace will be run by the producers themselves, through Emercoin open blockchain. Funds for launching and developing Hamster Marketplace will be raised through public distribution of HMT tokens during an ICO, starting in Autumn 2017.  The Hamster Marketplace trading platform offers producers:  - Decentralisation - Freedom from middlemen - A reduced entry threshold to the market - Access to new markets - Independent management of the marketplace - Freedom from the difficulties characteristic in retail  Don't forget to subscribe to our newsletter https://hmstr.io/

Author: An1ks
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: We are bringing Hamster to Europe. From October 2nd to 5th, 14,000 visitors to the Blockchain Solutions Forum in Barcelona will see our project. We will pitch our idea on the stage, set out our stand, and dive headfirst into the swing of the exhibition. http://www.blockchainsolutionsforum.com  https://i.imgur.com/Db5inwt.jpg

Author: HamsterMarketplace
Title: [ANN] ICO Hamster Marketplace - Decentralized marketplace for electronics
Body: Thanks for your question and sorry for a delayed response!  So basically our project is somehow similar to Amazon or Aliexpress, however it has so many special points, that we can say it's one of a kind.  There is no decentralized marketplace existing yet, however thanks to blockchain technology it became possible to create one.  If you would like to know more details please see our web https://hmstr.io/, especially Comparative Analysis part or you can deep dive into topic having a look at whitepaper.  The main points which differ us from existing marketplaces are:  -decentralization -marketplace run by manufacturers -no comission for vendors -high quality products for a wholesale prices  Please let me know if you have any other questions, will be happy to help!
